body_html: This issue probably contributes to the bad translation results people have reported from running the translation demo code (see #550). @PrajitR, I understand it may not be straightforward to provide a fix for the general seq2seq case, but what might the fix specifically for the translate demo implementation look like?
body_text: This issue probably contributes to the bad translation results people have reported from running the translation demo code (see #550). @PrajitR, I understand it may not be straightforward to provide a fix for the general seq2seq case, but what might the fix specifically for the translate demo implementation look like?
body: This issue probably contributes to the bad translation results people have reported from running the translation demo code (see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/550). @PrajitR, I understand it may not be straightforward to provide a fix for the general seq2seq case, but what might the fix specifically for the _translate_ demo implementation look like?
